faq.question: What is the bond for?
faq.answer: The bond is required as a security deposit and is refunded when the service is complete.

faq.question: Why do I have to pay a service fee?
faq.answer: The service fee covers the costs of diagnosis, repair, and maintenance of your device.

faq.question: Do I need a charger with my courtesy phone?
faq.answer: A charger is not mandatory, but you may request one when using a courtesy phone.

faq.question: Why isn’t my phone under warranty?
faq.answer: Your phone might not be under warranty if it’s beyond the warranty period or if it was damaged in a way not covered by the warranty.

faq.question: How long does a typical repair take?
faq.answer: Most repairs take between 2 to 5 business days, depending on the complexity of the issue and parts availability.

faq.question: Can I track the status of my repair?
faq.answer: Yes, you can check the status of your repair online using your service reference number provided at the time of booking.

faq.question: What if I need to cancel my repair?
faq.answer: You can cancel your repair by contacting us at least 24 hours before the scheduled service date. Some fees may apply.

faq.question: Are your replacement parts original?
faq.answer: We use high-quality replacement parts that are compatible with your device, though they may not be from the original manufacturer.

faq.question: Do you offer any warranty on repairs?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide a 90-day warranty on all repairs. This covers any defects in parts and workmanship related to the repair.

faq.question: Can I get a quote for the repair cost before service?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer free quotes. You can request a quote through our website or visit us in-store for a detailed assessment.

faq.question: What should I do if I find a problem after my repair?
faq.answer: If you encounter any issues after your repair, please contact us within the warranty period for a follow-up service.

faq.question: Will my data be safe during the repair?
faq.answer: We recommend backing up your data before the repair. While we take precautions, we cannot guarantee the safety of your data.

faq.question: Do you provide on-site repair services?
faq.answer: Yes, on-site repairs are available for certain issues and locations. Please contact us to see if on-site service is an option for you.

faq.question: Can you repair water-damaged phones?
faq.answer: We do repair water-damaged phones, but the success rate depends on the extent of the damage. We’ll assess the device and inform you of the possible outcomes.

faq.question: Do you offer any discounts for multiple repairs?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer discounts on multiple repairs for the same device. Contact our support team for more details on our discount policy.
